document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Have </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">any </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">like </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Myself </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#301034">Investigating </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">March, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">New </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">Houses </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">on </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#301034">Hill </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">descried </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5080ff">possibly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">Church </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">were </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">We </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">sure </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">lately </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cc0004">Snow </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">Today </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">if </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">We </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">exist </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Though </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">how </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">may </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">this </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Have </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">any </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">like </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Myself </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">Conjectured </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">may </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">Occupants </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">these </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#301034">Abodes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">So </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">easy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9848ff">Sky </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">'Twould </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">seem </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5080ff">God </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">should </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff6c8e">nearest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cc0004">Neighbor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5080ff">Heaven </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">convenient </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">Grace </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">For </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">Show, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9848ff">Company? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Have </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">any </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">like </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Myself </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5080ff">Preserved </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">Charm </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">secure </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">By </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">shunning </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9848ff">carefully </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9848ff"> </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Place </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">All </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">Seasons </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">Year, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">Excepting </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">March </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'Tis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">then </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">My </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">Villages </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">seen </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5080ff">possibly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">Steeple </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5080ff">afterward </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">Men </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Have any like myself
